CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. BHJ PSCs - This refers to the type of photovoltaic cells being studied, which are based on a specific material called BHJ (bulk heterojunction).
2. PffBB-12 - This is a specific material used in the active blend layer of the BHJ PSCs.
3. PffBB-14 - This is another specific material used in the active blend layer of the BHJ PSCs.
4. PffBB-16 - This is yet another specific material used in the active blend layer of the BHJ PSCs.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are: BHJ PSCs, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. BHJ PSCs
2. PffBB-12
3. PffBB-14
4. PffBB-16

These are the entities in the paragraph that refer specifically to the material names of the photovoltaic cells being studied.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PCE - Property Name (PCE stands for Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. BHJ PSCs - Property Name (BHJ PSCs stands for Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells)
3. PffBB-12 - Property Name (PffBB-12 stands for PffBB-12 is one of the materials used in the active blend layer)
4. PffBB-14 - Property Name (PffBB-14 stands for PffBB-14 is another material used in the active blend layer)
5. PffBB-16 - Property Name (PffBB-16 stands for PffBB-16 is another material used in the active blend layer)

So, the Property Names in the paragraph are:

PCE
BHJ PSCs
PffBB-12
PffBB-14
PffBB-16
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property:

1. PCE - Property Name (PCE stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a material property)
2. PffBB-12 - Material Property (PffBB-12 is a material used in the active blend layer)
3. PffBB-14 - Material Property (PffBB-14 is another material used in the active blend layer)
4. PffBB-16 - Material Property (PffBB-16 is another material used in the active blend layer)

So, the Material Properties in the paragraph are:

PffBB-12
PffBB-14
PffBB-16

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , BHJ PSCs based on PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 also exhibited the same trend in which their highest PCE was achieved by spin - coating the active blend layer at 80 °C .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the efficiency of the solar cells in converting sunlight into electrical energy.
2. 80 °C - This is the temperature at which the active blend layer was spin-coated, which is mentioned as the optimal temperature for achieving the highest PCE.

Therefore, the two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. 80 °C (temperature)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the efficiency of the solar cells in converting sunlight into electrical energy.

Therefore, the only entity that refers to the value of a material property in the paragraph is:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
